doc.name: input-textarea
doc.description: The wsfield < textarea > element represents a multi-line plain-text editing control.
doc.parameters:
wsfield type="textarea"


Optional support for different editors:

If VE4ALL extensions is installed : wsfield type="textarea" editor="ve" 

Please note that VE4ALL cannot handle textarea with required="required" !!

For more information on options for textarea, click on the link in the links section/
doc.example:
<wsfield type="textarea" name="comment" id="comment" placeholder="Type your comment there" required="required">
TEXT FOR TEXTAREA GOES HERE
</wsfield>
